chapter.title: CVE-2022-0023
chapter.text: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of exceptional conditions in the DNS proxy feature. By sending specially crafted traffic to the firewall, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

report.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-0023 Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS Vulnerability

chapter.title: Impact
chapter.text:
System Performance Degradation
Denial of Service
